Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: C. Peterman
Reviews.Content: This camera survived a trip to Antarctica and took some great pictures of penguinsIt survived temperatures of below -25C and lots of snow and iceall the little extras are nice too

Reviews.Title: This is a great all around camera for active people
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for both personal and industrial use.  I have ordered many of these over the past 2 years for inspection work in an oil refinery and it has proven to be a very dependable camera.  The waterproof, shock proof and durability of this camera has met its match out here and has passed the test for durability. -14 was just as good.  The WG I would highly recommend this camera and am considering one for myself.

ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio WG-2 GPS White Adventure Series 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 5 X Optical Zoom and GPS Super Bundle
